body_html: @goutham-nekkalapu The problem was (for the GTX 980) an actual OOM, although I initially thought it was a computational issue due to some misconfiguration in my Python environment or in the Training script, seeing the GPU unused during all the process.. In some cases you can set a different network or reduce the batch size and get it working. I ended with replacing the GPU.

body: @goutham-nekkalapu The problem was (for the GTX 980) an actual OOM, although I initially thought it was a computational issue due to some misconfiguration in my Python environment or in the Training script, seeing the GPU unused during all the process.. In some cases you can set a different network or reduce the batch size and get it working. I ended with replacing the GPU.
